participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Hardworking and passionate about his hobbies.
participant_1.background: my favorite band is aerosmith. i'm a construction worker. i have been working since i was sixteen years old. in my free time i like to watch nascar racing and ufc. my favorite food is mexican food.

participant_2.name: Amina
participant_2.personality: Resilient and spirited, with a love for life and freedom.
participant_2.background: i like to dance. i was born in somalia. i was forced to marry when i was a teenager. my aunt helped me escape when i was 17. now i live in the united states.
